title: Gulabi Jadau Kundan Haar - A Timeless Treasure
materials: Hyderabadi Kundan setting with Polki Diamonds
Ruby accents. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: Intricate Jadau Kundan setting showcasing uncut Polki diamonds. Features a floral motif with a large rose quartz centerpiece, encircled by vibrant emeralds and accented with rubies. Traditional paisley (Manga Malai) motifs are interspersed throughout the design. Handmade by skilled artisans from Hyderabad, ensuring exceptional craftsmanship.
occasions: and other special celebrations. A statement piece perfect for bridal wear and grand receptions.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship reflecting Hyderabad's rich jewelry heritage. The combination of Polki diamonds, Rose Quartz, Emeralds, and Rubies creates a stunning visual appeal. This Haaram is a valuable heirloom to be cherished for generations. Offers a blend of traditional design and contemporary elegance, perfect for the modern bride or jewelry enthusiast.
